Date: Monday, 5/26/1992
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Kevin Stanfield



Date: Friday, 5/30/1992
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Alfredo Griffin



Date: Monday, 6/2/1992
Subject: Progress of Raul Chavez
Dear Sir,
Raul Chavez is hitting the ball well at A St. Lucie Mets!
He has an AVG of .275, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 6/4/1992
Subject: Raul Chavez learns new position
Raul Chavez has made noteable progress
learning his new position, First Base.
I would rate his skills as "D" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Monday, 6/9/1992

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
